channel.title: Virginia Tech shooting today
channel.description:
http://latimesblogs.latimes.com/nationnow/2011/12/virginia-tech-shooting-dead-police-officer.html
Yet to be found. =/ I don't know how that school will even be able to remain open after something like this.

item.title: Virginia Tech shooting today
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

t4:

luckily it wasn’t as bad as the last time

Much different circumstances. The last shooter was completely deranged and shouldn’t have been allowed near a school. This person seems entirely different.

Read full topic

item.title: Virginia Tech shooting today
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Watching the live feed atm, the motorist that was stopped by the officer wasn’t the person that shot the officer, the shot was a 3rd person

Read full topic

item.title: Virginia Tech shooting today
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:5, topic:424582”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=527240.msg3842752#msg3842752 date=1323380811]

:S I heard about this when it just happened, at first it was reported as a police officer near campus was shot during a routine traffic stop, scary that it was actually on campus… And now a student dead as well :S

What’s worse is they have no leads?

I’m sure they’ll review some security footage and see if that can get them anywhere. If not, relatives / friends of the killer would probably turn him in. Has happened plenty of times, just a simple anonymous report.
[/quote]Only if anyone knows about it.[/quote]
More than likely. Shootings like this wouldn’t just happen for no reason.

BloodRayne:

I mean as of now though, the incident isn’t over and he could possibly still be on campus = more possible shootings?

They’ll probably increase their security over the next few days/weeks.

Read full topic
